attributes.action: Turn disused military establishments into housing for homeless veterans
attributes.additional_details: There are thousands of homeless veterans sleeping rough in the country they helped to protect. I want the Government to open up military properties that are not being used to house these veterans. This housing could be maintained and run by the veterans housed there.
attributes.background: Any military camp that is not being used should be turned into accommodation for homeless veterans.
